text: Londa Junction railway station (Station code: LD) is the primary railway station serving Londa in northern Karnataka. The station comes under the jurisdiction of Hubli division of South Western Railways. The station has three platforms. The station is situated on the Belgaum - Goa line with a branch line towards Hubbali. ==References== Hubli Category:Railway junction stations in Karnataka Category:Railway stations in Belgaum district
title: Londa Junction railway station
